chapters.title: Chapter 42: Falme
chapters.info: Ryma Galfrey, p. 598 (525)—Aes Sedai of the Yellow Ajah, now captured and leashed by the Seanchan. She is called “Pura” by her sul'dam. Moiraine regrets not being able to save her from Seanchan captivity. She made sure Egwene knew her real name; she fears she is losing herself, that she will eventually break under her captivity. See also Pura.
